author: timbeiko
content:
Merge Community Call in 20 minutes 

Agenda: https://github.com/ethereum/pm/issues/465
Zoom: https://ethereumfoundation.zoom.us/j/88178238471?pwd=b3Fmd2pGODBYNDZLdVZtVysrMjRHQT09

author: timbeiko
content: Re: post-merge testnets, this came up on the community call just now. Would it broadly make sene to have Goerli be the more app-friendly one (given a lot of apps are already on it) and Sepolia as more of a "client dev" testnet, where we mess with the conditions of the network, given there are less applications deployed?

author: sky.cactus
content: Has anyone started writing a JSON-RPC spec for `unsafe-head`, `safe-head`, `finalized` block tags (to go along with `pending`, `latest`, `earliest`)?

author: sky.cactus
content: It sounds like we need one soon.

author: hsiaowei
content:
[Heads up] The danksharding online educational workshop will be on **Feb 14th (Mon.) at 14:30 UTC**

Dankrad and Vitalik will give an interactive introduction. And also, we hope to have client devs to join the engineering Q&A/discussion!

It will be recorded and live-streaming.

Details and invite will be shared later today/tomorrow.
